name: akamai-beacon-parser
description: A simple library to parse Akamai Beacon URIs

scripts.build: browserify . -s akamai-beacon-parser -o dist/akamai-beacon-parser.js && uglifyjs dist/akamai-beacon-parser.js --comments --mangle --compress -o dist/akamai-beacon-parser.min.js
